main.name: Janani Nagaraj Amutha
main.description: Graduate with Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science & Engineering (India) and 4-years of professional experience as a Java developer. Recently earned a certificate in full stack development from University of California (Extension), San Diego.
main.bio: Right now, I am a stay at home mother. I took a career break to raise my son. I considered a career change when i wanted to come back to the workforce. I worked as a pre-school teacher for few months. That is when I realized how much I miss coding and debugging. I wanted to pursue my developer profession again. I realized the technology field has changed drastically. So I started to self-learn new skills and joined bootcamp to get employer-ready. I am proficient in React, Node server, MySQL, Mongo database and MERN and demonstrate strong logical, analytical, problem solving skills. Eager to combine my background in Computer Science with my technical skills to develop robust and user friendly software.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: University of San Diego (Extension), California, USA
San Diego Miramar College, California, USA

work.title: Teacher
work.description: Teacher for a group of 12, 4-5 year old kids.

work.company: Tata Consultancy Services, Tamil Nadu, India
work.title: Java Developer
work.description: Received client appreciation in British Telecom project for exhibiting thorough understanding of the requirement, meeting the deadlines, doing a thorough unit testing and perioding demos. This helped in identifying any gaps in requirements and taking decisions for such scenarios, thus providing the client with more functional and serviceable application. Received “Star of the month” in Nokia Siemens Network project for learning new technology (OIM) and implementing the same in the project thus providing the client a more optimized application. Received “Certificate of Recognition” in USAA project for exhibiting outstanding performance in the project and developing RESTful webservice with zero production defects. The technologies used are : Java, Restful API, OIM, Oracle, MySQL, Message Driven Beans.

projects.category: This music app allows the user to choose a button (Happy, Sad, Mad, Love) depending on their mood and displays song suggestions depending upon user's choice.

projects.title: BUDGET TRACKER
